meanings.definition: A person who holds a grudge.
meanings.sent1: The grudgers refused to forgive their friend for the mistake.
meanings.sent2: She became known as one of the grudgers in the office, always remembering past grievances.
meanings.sent3: The grudgers at the party kept giving each other the cold shoulder.
meanings.sent4: The grudgers in the family tree cast a shadow over every gathering.
meanings.sent5: The image of the grudgers sitting silently in the corner lingered in his mind.

meanings.definition: To hold a grudge against someone.
meanings.sent1: He grudgers against his former boss for not promoting him.
meanings.sent2: She grudgers about the unfair treatment she received at the store.
meanings.sent3: The cat grudgers at the closed door, wanting to go outside.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds grudgers over the city, threatening rain.
meanings.sent5: His heart grudgers with resentment, unable to let go of the past.
